name: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum Travel Spray
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Sandalwood, Vetiver, Amber Wood.Fragrance Description:Maison Louis Marie composes delicate scents to enchant your lifestyle with a botanical tradition since 1792. This scent is a sandalwood fragrance with a dominant cedarwood and sandalwood accord supplemented by a spicy cinnamon nutmeg complex and an earthy vetiver note..About the Fragrance:Louis Marie Aubert du Petit Thouars was a pioneer in French botanical history. Marie du Petit Thouars continues his legacy by creating luxurious products that focus on illustrious scents imbued with unique floral fragrances. All of her creations are phthalate-, paraben-, sulfate- and cruelty-free.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Citronellol, Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Eugenol, Limonene, Citral..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: All fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body: apply 1-2 sprays at the pulse points of your body (wrists, neck), or in the creases of your knees and elbows for a stronger, more enduring scent. Reapply as needed...Bottle is 100% recyclable just remove sprayer and cap beofre disposal. Secondary packaging is 100% recyclable

reviews.review_title: Is this old stock or has the formula changed?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this size in the past, I loved it so much I bought the full size. This season I decided to just purchase the travel size. The scent is very weak and doesn't last more than an hour. I don't know if I will make another purchase of this brand from Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells rich!  Great staying power too!  I can still smell it when I go to bed after Iu2019ve had it on all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best smell and I highly recommend it.  I get so so many compliments

Really disappointed in this product. Purchased in store on 9/2. When I arrived home and opened the box, the perfume was nearly gone. I could smell the perfume without having sprayed it, so figured it somehow leaked. I went back to Sephora the next day and exchanged it without issue. Used it for a two week vacation, and the bottle is nearly gone. I've never had a problem with any other perfume evaporating, but that seems to be what is happening. Based on other reviews noting the same issue, there must be an issue with the bottle and how it is sealed. Will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent along with a few others in this brand. They all last well, all day for me. I bought the body lotion in this scent also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the packaging is simple but beautiful. Love the minimalist look and when you open the package you get a lovely glass bottle that is filled with this beautiful scent. When I first applied to my wrists it took me back to a forest - I smell sandalwood and pine. Itu2019s very refreshing but light. I love the way it smells on my body. I also love that this can be used by a man. Itu2019s a very attractive scent so I can see why both genders can use it. I wore it out one night and I could smell it in the warm air as I sipped on my wine. I really like that it is not overpowering like other scents - itu2019s very fresh and perfect for every day or special occasions. I honestly love this as an everyday scent & going to look at layering it with no 14 down the line. I highly recommend this scent if you love sandalwood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like santal. This will be your dupe because it smells exactly the same to me.
Smells great but it came broken and about a quarter of it spilled out. Thanks sephora!
Santal 33 without the harsh pickle opening. Woody, fresh, and smooth. Beautiful beautiful scent
This smells like guava leave so refreshing almost like santal 33 but better imo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a sucker for earthy/woody scents! So this is absolutely perfect. I only need about 2 or 3 sprays, and it lasts me the whole work day. Itu2019s such a fresh scent, very botanical. And I really like that I doesnu2019t smell alcohol-y.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like Santal. So good. Love it. Maybe a hint of coconut.

reviews.review_title: Love the scent but it evaporated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent but would not repurchase because like many reviewers said, it evaporated in the bottle within 2 weeks, and that was with no noticeable leaks and the bottle standing upright on my dresser. I purchased the oil which is a much more expensive version but it hasn't evaporated and I think the scent lasts longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, woody, perfect for when you want to feel clean and put together. Not the best in terms of lasting power, but happy to re apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very unique scent. Whenever I wear it I get lots of compliments. Long lasting, too!

reviews.review_title: Love this fragrance - light and sophisticated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fragrance - it's a perfect blend for me in terms of something that I want to wear everyday. How this smells on you will definitely depend on your chemistry though. My friend purchased the oil version and she loved it at first...but then the scent turned on her and started to smell like cat nip. Buying the smaller size is more prudent to see how it will react with your PH. Also, I didn't remove a star for it, but the bottle does have some issues - the top loosened significantly on me even though it has only been stored in a vertical position - so I would be wary of this if traveling with it and maybe put it in a Ziploc just in case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this on one day while in Sephora and as the day went by I kept smelling this beautiful fresh yet woody scent and I realized it was this so I went back and brought it and now itu2019s one of the first scent I go too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very clean and light. Different and airy. Great scent for spring.

reviews.review_title: Do not use if not upright at all times
reviews.review_text: Aw much as I love the smell, the packaging ruined it. Itu2019s a travel size so I bought it so I could take it home on the plane with me, and when I arrived home half had spilled out of the bottle into the box, and the other half was in the capu2026so my luggage smells amazing, but I cannot enjoy it like I wished. Such an extreme bummer and disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I originally received this as a sample and after wearing it to work for a day, I kept smelling it throughout the day and absolutely loving the scent. I knew I had to purchase a larger version. It's a beautiful woodsy scent that is versatile enough to wear for daytime or for a night out. Just love it!

reviews.review_title: Why does this smell like pickles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thatu2019s it, thatu2019s the whole review. This smells like it would be delicious spritzed on a grilled chicken sandwich and I would like to know why so I can spend the rest of my life avoiding perfumes with that note.

reviews.review_title: Love it but it doesnu2019t last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this product and the price point. Everything is perfect except for the fact that it doesnu2019t last very long at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I get so many compliments when I wear this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never liked a perfume as much as this one! Iu2019m picky and I'm obsessed with it!! It lasts well. Not sure about the reviews - I bought mine in store and the bottle is great. It deserves more than only 3 stars! I will say when I sometimes spray it on myself  instead of clothes, it has an off smell but itu2019s worth it because I love itu2019s actual smell so much. I like it better than baccarat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought on a whim as I love amber. I wa afraid due to reports of damaged bottles but both of mine were fine. The scent is like nothing Iu2019ve ever worn before. My husband loved it on me

reviews.review_title: Love it so much, I wish it lasted longer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell so much. Itu2019s slightly spicy while still being a clean scent. I spray it on my pillow so the next morning my hair smells of it. Doesnu2019t last as long as some which is why 4/5 stars.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the price, scent does not last.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVED this scent initially when I smelt in stores - it gave me Santal 33 vibes. HOWEVER - this scent does not last and the more I wore it and the more time passed, the afterscent was quite vinegary and did not smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the fragrance but the bottle leaked all over so I only got 2 uses out of it! Very disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is NOT at all anything like Santal 33! Itu2019s one of the worst purchases Iu2019ve made with respect to perfume. I read all these beauty editors raving about how this is an exact u201cdupeu201du2014the only one who got duped was me believing them! If you like this fragrance on you, awesome! But if youu2019re trying to save some money to wear your signature Santal 33 fragrance, please test this first beypurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Good scent, but horrible spray bottle
reviews.review_text: Scent is woody and clean u2013 lasts for a good majority of the day with just two spritzes.  When I first got the travel spray, it was leaking a lot, so I thought I just got a faulty bottle, but even after I replaced it with a brand new one I had the same problem. It leaks a crazy amount and the rest completely evaporated. The spray top also gets stuck once you press it, so you have to manually pry it out in order to use it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so delicious, like a luxurious spa deep in the mountains. I got a sample of the oil and then got this because iu2019m obsessed, its so spicy, warm and woody.
Spritzer broke within the first week and it leaks it turned over sideways in makeup bag.  Great scent but horrible packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Delicious fragrance but doesnu2019t last long. Will use it all but will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this scent! Fresh, clean, earthy.   3 stars - because of the packaging. Spritzer stopped working within 2 weeks, and I thought I could make it work. I should have exchanged it then. It also leaked all over my makeup bag. Wasted half of the bottle. Why would it not be permanently sealed like most travel sprays? I shouldn't be able to twist it open. If I do buy this again, will use tape to secure  I also purchased the perfume oil version, which I also adore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell. Very light and clean but still feminine. However I didnu2019t get to use it for very long because the bottle leaks very easily and emptied in my makeup bag. I sealed it back up as soon as I could, but the rest evaporated within a couple weeks. Such a bummer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, very fruity floral, it smells amazing and lasts all day long. Itu2019s very nice and the packaging is a little smaller so you can just throw it in your purse and have it on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new go-to. It smells like a warm fireplace. Very woody and earthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: More of a summer scent as it smells a bit like coconut.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this! I described it the other day as u201cmaking me smell rich.u201d That might be stretching it but honestly for me itu2019s a very elevated fragrance. I get a tiny bit of floral at first then it wears into a nice, warm but not sweet scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Reminds me of vacation, like a luxurious smelling hotel. I got the travel to be safe - didnu2019t want to commit to the full size if I didnu2019t like it u2014 Will def purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an extremely cheap product. Donu2019t purchase it! I purchased one in store for a vacation and immediately had to walk back into the store and exchange it because the spritz mechanism didnu2019t work. That shouldu2019ve been my first clue. I only used it one time before taking it on vacation, and when I arrived at my destination, with the perfume in my carry-on bag, it had completely emptied out during the flight. A total waste of $35.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've worn Santal 33 before and this is definitely a great dupe for that perfume at a much lower price point. Because perfumes smell different on each person I don't think I'd be able to tell if someone walked by me wearing this whether it was No. 4 or Santal 33. But I can tell sliiiight differences on myself. First difference is that this is a bit softer - not as strong projection, not as intense, and doesn't last as long (Santal lasts crazy long). But that's okay and to be expected because it's so much cheaper. The second is that while they are both unisex scents, No 4 is slightly sweeter (maybe from the cinnamon and nutmeg notes?) so sliiiightly more feminine, barely noticeable. Though again, still very unisex. I totally get why some people think it smells like dill pickles. On first spray I totally get that vibe and even when it dries I can still pick that up. But somehow even with that description it still works?! But it is a very herbally/woodsy scent so it won't be for everyone. There are many days I just want to smell like a sweet flower and this does not fit that bill. I understand that everyone in L.A. and in many other large cities smells like this bc Santal is so popular but where I'm from and in my social circles no one does, making it really unqiue and unexpected. Five stars for nailing this type of scent profile, if it's what you are into.

reviews.review_title: My Favorite! But the packaging/ spray bottle...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my absolute favorite fragrance for about a year or more. Not overpowering, fresh, soft, a bit earthy like me. I love both the spray and the oil. The oil is fab.  I'm giving it 4 stars because the travel spray has failed me twice. The one I have in my purse right now has stopped spraying. At first it was intermittent and now it has quit spraying altogether so I have to unscrew the top and apply with the straw. The last one I bought, the top came unscrewed In my purse and it all leaked out. It's a travel spray. The top should stay on. That bottle was a complete loss and waste not money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell! Absolutely divine ufffc, came full, but was unscrewed slightly. Because itu2019s a traveling size I can refill it. Waiting for my full size to come in. I was very sensitive during pregnancy to any perfume, this was the only one I liked , now Iu2019m obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: please fix your packaging. I love this scent so much but am afraid to pack it or bring it anywhere because the whole bottle leaks. i bought one and it leaked all in my purse now itu2019s empty.
I love this sent. I found it in the store and it smells so bougie but also subtle. This sent will last me all day and gives me the most compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE. Itu2019s not overwhelming but reminds me of Le Labo Santal 33. Buy immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume!!It definitely doesn't smell like dill lol.It's fresh warm and neutral.I suffer from migraines and this doesn't effect me at all.I did take off one star because the travel perfume has spilled in my purse many times....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful clean scent. My daughter describes it as how the hotel lobby  in Mexico smelled. The scent does last, the travel size is perfect. I would keep this for more of a summer scent as it is so light and lovely ud83dude0a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with the scent but do frustrated with the packaging. When I purchased this the first time I went to grab it from my bag and noticed the entire bottle had leaked out when I went back to Sephora they have me new one and the same thing happened the very next day. My purse smells amazing but I have zero perfumeufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fine? Very little smell. It isnu2019t offensive it just doesnu2019t smell like anything except a touch of sandalwood when it comes out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: smells like salt and wet, moldy grass. not for me.

reviews.review_title: Bad packaging means you lose money!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle issues are true. I lost more than 60% of the product when the bottle was accidentally turned upside down in my luggage. My clothes smelt really nice but all the product is gone. Such a shame because I love this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become one of my favorite perfumes. Itu2019s hard to explain the scent other than it smells woodsy an elegant all at the same time.ufffc The scent lasts a long time which I appreciate. bDefinitely purchasing this againufffc

I really like this fragrance, summery, light, I bought the travel version and put it in my purse, after a couple of hours I smelled the perfume from my purse and saw that almost all the perfume had dripped and run out and there was no perfume left. I don't know what to do about it, it's very sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I sprayed this before work & I could smell it throughout the day! It definitely reminds me of 7 Virtueu2019s Santal Vanille, but slightly less woodsy, more elegant for sure! I really like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is becoming one of my favorite everyday scents. It's strong at first and kind of earthy, but dries down to a nice floral mix. It also lasts really well all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super unique scent! I wanted to try something different and I was so intrigued by this scent. A little fresh, earthy, herbal, a tad masculine. I heard some people hate this because it smells like dill, and while I can understand where thatu2019s coming from, itu2019s a very pleasant, floral dill-reminiscent scent. I have received several compliments on this perfume. If youu2019re looking for a perfume unlike any other youu2019ve tried, get this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent, earthy and lovely.  Highly recommend, this is a great buy.

reviews.review_title: listen to reviews.. itu2019ll come half empty.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this perfume but the spray bottle is so badly designed. I received my package today and opened the perfume and it was 1/8th full. Took it back. Donu2019t buy if youu2019re ordering it online
Love the scent . Packaging terrible as emptied out in my purse  . Would love to repurchase if only the packaging / bottle held parfum !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obssessed with this product. The scent is so clean but earthy and refreshing. The travel spray also is a great size for on the go. Finally found my scent.
Love this scent! Smells the exact same to Le Labo Santal 33 if youu2019re familiar, for a fraction of the price! Such a steal!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m terrible at describing scents so Iu2019m not gonna try. But itu2019s amazing! Try to smell it at your local store if they have it. Very woodsy and NOT florally so depending on your preferences may not be for you. I just came here to say that it stays around! A lot of times Iu2019ll spray my perfume and not smell it again at all. This I keep getting whiffs everyone once in awhile

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am giving this product a one-star due to the fact that it leaked during shipping.  I received less than half a full bottle.  The scent itself is amazing.

I really love this fragrance - it's very unique and not everyone's cup of tea.  I've heard comparisons with Le Labo Santal 33, which I've never tried. I don't understand the pickle reference.  However, my travel spray was defective - they forgot to add a hole to spray through :(  So, I have to unscrew it and dab with the atomizer straw

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. I think itu2019s a great unisex scent, as my husband loves it as well. Itu2019s earthy, woodyu2014 but bright. It reminds me of the smell of the woods on a summer morning after the rain. I just wish it lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely scent but does not last. Bought it to compare to my FAVORITE perfume, Band of Outlaws, at a lesser price point. Well, they smell similar and I almost even like this scent more u2026but it doesnu2019t grip to you whatsoever. I will use it but wonu2019t be buying again. Sadly it seems the only perfumes that last all day are over $100.

reviews.review_title: Good for some, I am sure.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrance did not mesh well with me, and it does not last very long. I took a shot and ordered without smelling it first.  Glad I just bought the small size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really loved the oil version of this perfume but did not like the spray perfume I just couldnu2019t really smell it very well and the spray cap would come off when you tried to spray it. I gave it away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought two bottles. One came empty because the cap wasn't screwed on properly. The second one came with a damaged cap that makes it very hard to spray the perfume. I am very disappointed in the packaging. The sent however is quite beautiful and charming. But I still wouldn't recommend to spend money on this if the chance of getting an empty or damaged bottle is so high.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im fragrance obsessed and i love this ,i even spray my bedding with it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This review is for the bottle only. The scent is wonderful but the bottle is horrible!! I liked the scent so much I bought two even tho the first one emptied out in my purse after only 3 uses. I thought maybe it was a defective bottle but no!!! They are all this way. Donu2019t spend your money on this!! Why canu2019t this company fix this issue?!! Clearly itu2019s an issue as so many other reviews have pointed out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally think this smells amazing and is a perfect dupe for santal 33. I just wish it lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very soft, beautiful scent. It smells very similar to 7 Virtues Santal Vanille but much softer.  It seems to sit very close to the skin without much projection.  It is very creamy and woody but Iu2019m not getting any of the spice on my skin. I think this could be a great all year scent as itu2019s fresh and light but still warm and cozy as well.   I will definitely purchase a full sized bottle.

reviews.review_title: I can't get enough of this scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this parfum with an order, and fell in love. I ordered the travel size so I could be absolutely sure. I am. I think this is a beautiful scent. I have read other reviews that it has a pickle note. To me, it comes through as lime. I do wish it lasted longer. It lasts about 3-4 hours on me. I love it so much that I have already hinted at wanting the full size for Valentine's Day since my partner loves it too. I suggest you smell it for yourself before believing the pickle reviews, as scent is unique on everyone. I can't get enough of it.
I feel like itu2019s a really good dupe for Santal 33 I have both and I use this if I donu2019t want to use the other one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this scent. It smells very, very similar to Le Labou2019s Santal 33. Sadly, it has zero staying power. No matter how much I put on, no one can smell anything on me by mid day. I suggest splurging on Le Labo as it lasts allllll day long u2014 therefore your bottle will last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sprayer doesnu2019t work except for an occasional small leak from under the cap. Loved the small rollerball so much so I bought the travel spray. Disappointed. This is the second travel size Iu2019m returning this week, the first being the 7 Virtues Santal Vanilla rollerball which arrived leaking in the box.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Experienced that u201cpickleu201d smell other reviewers described. Definitely not a blind buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loooooove this scent. woodsy, earthy, a bit spicy, and soooo unique. i didnu2019t want anything floral or sweet, so this was exactly what i was looking for!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: yes, this is 100% a santal 33 dupe. not close, not similar, 100% exact dupe. I absolutely love the smell, to me I smell white tea, my husband smells citrus, the main note described is vetiver. Iu2019m not a perfume expert, all I know is this smells phenomenal. I have my signature scents, and have been happy with them for years, but this had to be added to my collection. just smell it! youu2019ll be convinced. I feel like it fades a bit, but my partner says he can smell it hours later, especially as I walk by. 10/10. will be picking up the oil since Iu2019ve heard itu2019s a little stronger.

Very unique fragrance. I love it. Howver, it's not as strong as I would like it to be. Don't know if that's a fragrance issue, or if it's my body chemistry . Highly recommend at least trying the travel size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I typically like very clean scents so I wasnu2019t sure I was going to like this. I LOVE it. Although I like No. 12 better than this one, this is a great scent. My body tends to go directly to whatever the bottom note with most perfumes. This one is the same all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my third bottle of this insanely great fragrance and I love it! I was looking for a travel spray-not a rollerball-and I'm glad I picked this one. I hope when the seasons change they'll have a heavier/spicier more autumn-y fragrance, too.

reviews.review_title: u will smell like u fresh out da shower hunny
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For a mini bottle the spray doesnu2019t use too much too soon and the parfum lasts a LONG time! I will be purchasing the full size when a few of my others run out! Very fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Scent is nice but the sprayer doesnu2019t work. The packaging is a cheaply made. It wonu2019t press so canu2019t actually get anything out of the bottle. Tossed away the box before discovering this so canu2019t return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love it! It smells better then santal 33  will definitely get the full size for fall

reviews.review_title: Great Scent. Just Don't Buy Travel Size
reviews.review_text: Love love the scent. I don't recommend purchasing the travel size at all. Like the other reviews mention, there's a defect and the fragrance evaporates and leaks. When I initially purchased some of the fragrance had already evaporated. I should've looked into this then and saved my money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent has me by the neck. Iu2019m obsessed. Mixed with my body chem, itu2019s intoxicating. Iu2019m getting the big bottle IMMEDIATELY. Chileeeeu2026.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the scent but leaked like crazy. I like to keep these sizes in my purse but it kept leaking. I exchanged it thinking it was just a bad container but nope the second one was worse. I tightened it and everything but leaked every where. Iu2019ve had it barely over a week and I have maybe a fifth left. Whatu2019s the point of a travel perfume if it literally has to stay standing up and canu2019t be trusted to not leak when traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so obsessed with this scent- super nostalgic to me for whatever reason. I personally get a sandalwood-jasmine-rose scent. I think it pairs perfectly with the sol de Janeiro Pom dia cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite perfume. It is so amazing that I like to wear it and in the summer and in the winter. Itu2019s pretty long lasting. Love the travel size so I can take it with me everywhere. I think Iu2019m on my third bottle now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just like half the population, Iu2019m obsessed with Le Labou2019s Santal 33. I wore it forever but hated the insane price. I needed a nice dupe. After doing tons of research, I found this one (whose name I can never remember). This Maison Louis perfume is a SPOT ON DUPE. There is no difference. It wears the same and even stays on my clothes through a wash cycle, ha. Itu2019s half the price and easier to find since my local Sephora carries it. I had to order Santal 33 online. Anyway I highly recommend this- itu2019s also nice for layering with vanilla scents and my Kai Rose scent sometimes. Get you some:-D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like the other reviews- scent is amazing but the bottle is just awful! a bunch was already gone when it was delivered and it constantly leaks out the top even without the lid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the scent. Obsessed with it, and the portability of this spray. However, the spray function of the bottle did not work, so that was a nightmare in applying the perfume. And then it just started evaporating somehow in my apartment. And I took it on a plane and it completely vanished/evaporated. So I paid $30 to smell great about three times...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand the negative reviews. It smells like a warm and earthy sandalwood. It lasts more than five hours for me and I see that as long lasting. It isnu2019t overpowering yet is noticeable and not a super close to the skin fragrance. If you want to try Santal 33 or something that feels like late summer/fall then go with this. I was recommended it from ohuprettythings on TikTok and donu2019t regret the purchase. Unisex but could be a good date night fragrance. I reach for this often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent so much! But does not last at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don't get me wrong, this scent is lovely and light but the packaging is TERRIBLE! I bought this for a two week trip and by the end of it , it was GONE! not because I used it but because it had leaked everywhere! This container does not properly seal and you should not buy it until they fix the problem bc $30 should not evaporate just like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Delllishhhh! Not sure what others are referencing with the lighter scents- on myself itu2019s spicy & warm woodsy! Iu2019d say itu2019s decently long lasting without being overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Echoing the reviews before, I was carrying this travel spray around in my bag and it continually leaked, which is very unfortunate as itu2019s not exactly cheap. I must have wound up wasting around half of the bottle. Iu2019m giving it two stars because it really does smell great, but I wonu2019t be repurchasing until the issue with the bottle is fixed.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful scent, but bottle not sealed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent, I took off a star because I can see that some product came out before I took it out of the box. Not the end of the world, but something that should be addressed by MLM's quality control.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great but the bottle I received was half empty! Looking through the reviews I see this is an issue. The smell is fantastic - reminds me a lot of Diptyque Philosykos, but a little sharper and not as soft. Iu2019d love to recommend it but I wonu2019t be spending $28 for a half empty bottle and will stick with Diptyque instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, LOVE the scent. Itu2019s gorgeous. The packaging is terrible though

reviews.review_title: Does not work with my chemistry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took a chance on Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt because I was intrigued by the descriptions in the reviews - how could one perfume be interpretted in so many complex ways?   Unfortunately, on my chemistry this smells like lightly peppery rubber tires. On my husband it smells absolutely exquisite - masculine, peppery, musky in such a light way. I could smell him all day.  I bought a travel spray of SWEET at the same time which was too sweet for me, so I tried layering them together (2/3 SWEET and 1/3 No. 04, and this wore out very well all day. Slightly less sweet pear with pepper was the result. I didn't aim to smell quite so delicious/ gourmand, but I enjoyed getting whiffs of them together all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent. Lasts all day long. Very woodsy scent. Really unique. My boyfriend thought the scent was amazing as well. Got as a sample. Lasts quite a bit. Love the oil formula. Will purchase this!
I love this scent- itu2019s warm and musk in a lovely way. However the scent is so light, it really doesnu2019t last on me. Wish it were a bit stronger so you could smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does not smell at all I had hoped. I completely smell dill. I hate dill. Certainly donu2019t want to smell like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am partial to woodsy scents with amber and sandalwood, so this is the perfect perfume for me. I have chemical sensitivities so most perfumes cause me a headache. This one did not! It makes me feel seductive and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells soooooooo good! Got a sample and just had to buy a bigger one!!!! My bf loved it on me. Itu2019s a little masc and can be unisex

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was immediately drawn to this on the store, and it smells great on. It has a woodsy scent that is creamy and calming. Very light without being feminineu2014Iu2019d say it leans towards unisex.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! I imagine this is what sophistication smells like. Definitely hits the woody notes I love but in a completely fresh and compelling way that I've never smelled before. My husband went berserk when I put this on. Once again, an inspired pick by the AMAZING Muner at the Old Orchard Sephora. That man knows how to use his nose! Heehee. I also love that this is a clean scent and cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love LOVE sandalwood and the reason I bought this. I was expecting a cozy woodsy scent but what I got hit with right away was a fresh cucumber to  cucumber/melon note that I HATE followed by a little cedar wood. I notice no sandalwood at all. This fragrance is disgusting to me and will be returned soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. Its a very warm texture with some characteristics scent. I will be using during winter time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells soo earthy and fresh I love it! Smell lasts a long time itu2019s my 3rd bottle.... I prefer the oil in this scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried it in store and it smelled great almost similar to Santal 33. Purchased the roller ball and it was pretty empty which got me a bit disappointed. I tried giving it a chance ,I noticed the rollerball didnu2019t say as well as the bottle but even then I had to drench my self i it before I noticed it stuck. And thats wasteful so I wont be buying it anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the woodsy, spicy scent, but the bottle is soooo problematic. The nozzle came broken, and because of social distancing, I donu2019t feel comfortable going to exchange it. I have to turn it an odd way for it to spray out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most beautiful scent that I feel I have been looking for my entire life. I have oily skin and perfumes tend to not stick to me, but this scent lasts well into the day. I love it even more knowing that is has clean ingredients and it's a very unique scent that could be unisex in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I love the scent I wish I would have read the reviews because my bottle was also about 1/3 empty.  Very disappointing to pay $29 for such a small amount of perfume.

reviews.review_title: What's up with the half empty bottle?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I also opened my box and it seemed that half of the bottle was gone...soooo disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I should have read the other reviews. My bottle came maybe 2/3rds to one half full. Very disappointed in Sephora for this quality control:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! Itu2019s pretty and light. You can wear it day or night. Itu2019s a new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so I love this scent the review is not for the scent. This travel spray absolutely comes only 2/3 full. This many reviews canu2019t be a coincidence. Mine was the same as all previous reviews. 1/3 of the bottle was air!!!! Come on!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent... Very inconsistent quantity! I am strongly disappointed to see that my bottle came 1/2 empty. I did NOT agree to pay nearly $40 to get 3mL of this perfume.   I am so UNSATISFIED that not even the great scent of the little liquid received can make up for it.   Please work on your packaging as it is detrimental to your company's image of luxury!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent, but packages are filled with different amounts after checking a few in store after I opened the box and realized mine was nearly half empty. Manager claimed this was normal but we opened a few boxes and each had a different amount inside... ? Iu2019m guessing some has evaporated? Or the bottle leaks?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scent is great, but first bottle and second (replacement) were 2/3 full.  They did send a replacement, but I wouldn't order it again because of this issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have worn Chanel #5 and Chanel # 19 for years. I am on the journey for a replacement signature scent and this is not it!
Love this scent - similar to Le Labo Santal 33. Definitely recommend for people that like earthy/woody scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't smell of sandalwood at all. Rather smells like my dad's body wash.
Received this and came immediately to the reviews to see this is a common problem... Not right at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells wonderful, but it arrived 1/3 empty. I decided it wasnu2019t with the time to review until that same week, I flew somewhere and when I landed it was empty. My brand new perfume was totally gone within the span of a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For packaging alone I have to give the product 2 stars. Iu2019ve ordered many perfumes online and Iu2019ve never seen a bottle come with 1/4 of the product missing? I think itu2019s important to leave a review and picture for this especially after seeing this isnu2019t the first complaint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful sent and love that I can try without purchasing a bigger bottle. The only thing I didnu2019t love was that the scent disappears quite quickly due to it being a spray. I heard the oil works better. Will purchase again - almost out!

reviews.review_title: Think twice about ordering perfume online
reviews.review_text: Arrived with 1 inch of perfume. Must have leaked in the shipment process. Bummed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review is strictly for the packaging, not the scent. When I opened my travel spray upon receiving it in the mail there was about 1/4 of product missing! I understand some space needs to be left in the bottle but this is just unacceptable. Iu2019ve purchased so many travel sized spray bottles from other brands and this has never happened before. So disappointed.
My first impression was that the scent was too woodsy and hardly any hint of floral.  But it has grown on me. I now love it so very much.  Give it a chance and you might be surprised!

reviews.review_title: Smells great (for an hour or two)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While I love the scent of this perfume, it wears off much faster than I want it to. Overall kind of disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Love the scent, but evaporates out of the bottle.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent but it EVAPORATES quickly. I went through the whole thing in 3 months, only using it a couple of times a week. Every time I took it out again more was gone, though I kept it in the box so I know it wasn't leaking (the box wasn't wet and didn't smell). I'll buy the full size next time because even though this is inexpensive, it feels like a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only reason I'm not giving this 5 stars is the packaging. The first time I pulled the cover off, the whole top came off and I lost a third of the contents on my dresser. I did see that some other customers had similar perfumes. The scent itself is a delight and I will purchase again, just not the travel spray. This was a new scent for me, so I didn't want to spend too many dollars for a trial.

reviews.review_title: Great scent, but worth it to buy the big boy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite scents, and I went to a store to buy the full sized version. They were out of the normal bottles, so I had to settle for their smaller travel one. Thought it would be perfect! Well not only is the packing so terrible that a third of it evaporated before I even opened the packed, but the scent does NOT last nearly as long! Weu2019re talking 2 sprays = 1-2 hour max. Just is super annoying. Will not be purchasing this one again until packaging at a minimum is changed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ordered this because reviews said it was a Santal 33 dupe. I'm not sure if I consider this one an actual dupe but there are similar notes. I just sprayed it on myself for the first time and it smells really good. Giving it 3 stars now but i'll update my review after wearing it for a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The ultimate le labo santal 33 dupe. I love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The closest Iu2019ve ever come to Commodity by Book (my fav) I love this so much and Iu2019m expecting the full size in the mail right now. Itu2019s no Book but it will do until Commodity relaunches. The only reason why I wonu2019t give it 5 stars is that it does not last long on the body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this scent. I am transitioning to using all cruelty free products and have been on the hunt for a good scent. This is IT. I smelled it in-store and decided to purchase the travel scent to wear it for a few days to make sure I still liked it. After a few days of wear, I decided to jump in and buy a full bottle. I just want to smell myself all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So woodsy yet not a hippie fragrance. Not sweet at all. It smells like walking through a park in the spring where trees are blooming nearby. I might have to buy the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is like a lighter Santal 33, which makes it more wearable for me. (I find Santal 33 too strong for everyday wear.) This fragrance is wonderful and lasted a long time. Love that it comes in the travel size.
This smells so good! I feel better whenever I put this on. This one has very similar scent as the le labo's santal 33, but it's more feminine I would say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is nice but after a short time I didnu2019t notice it on me anymore so I donu2019t think it lasted. Other perfumes Iu2019ve used have lasted longer. I also returned the first bottle I bought because it was leaking, then the second one completely emptied out into my makeup case in my bag. I didnu2019t even bother to return it, which now regret since I noticed multiple people had the same issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this two stars because I love the scent but have had the same faulty bottle issue where the cap got stuck on the spray nozzle as others have commented on. I was able to get the cap off but now the spray nozzle threads are stripped and the top wonu2019t stay on and it leaks if not left upright. It completely defeats the purpose of a travel spray. Stick to the perfume oil roll-on instead unless they can figure out their packaging issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite scent. Just the right amount of musky, but still femme. Reminds me of my LeLabo perfumes but way less expensive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and went to the store today to get the travel spray. Got it home and the bottle is broken. The spray nozzle is stuck in the cap. Super annoyed. I got it for vacation tomorrow so now I canu2019t use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a unique and gorgeous scent. I have not smelled anything like this before. It is a sophisticated, European scent. I gave it 4 stars because it does not last long.
This smells like the old scratch and sniff pickle sticker from my slam book back in the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing, i love Santal 33 and this is pretty spot on for so much cheaper. I was so excited to try this scent out for awhile before buying the full size so i ordered the purse spray. I have bought many purse sprays/roll ons before but i have never had one explode all over my bag within ONE DAY. I received it Friday evening and by Sunday morning it was completely empty and my purse stunk. It has a twist off top(not the cap, the actual top of the spray), and it had come undone. Iu2019m hoping to get a refund and try another perfume because the whole purpose of a purse spray is to be in your purse and if it canu2019t do that then whatu2019s the point. Iu2019m still amazed at this company for choosing  to not to make it a more standard product type to avoid accidents like this .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My sprayer is a little crooked and doesn't work well. But I love this scent and I will hoard it since I'm sad Commodity's Book parfum is gone. My partner always says I smell like cedar when I wear this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Something is wrong with the bottle. First time I bought it i put it in my purse only to find some has leaked and was visibly gone about an inch worth. I went to the store to return it and the girl exchanged it for me instead for a new bottle, fine. I went home to spray to find half of the spray is gone. No thank you. I read some reviews and I think few people had the same problem. Shame cus it is a beautiful scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful scent.   Lasted most of the day.  Will undoubtedly make this one of my regulars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this perfume. I decided to grab a rollerball to keep in my purse. However I bought this in store and after I opened it noticed itu2019s lopsided?? I donu2019t know if it effects the perfume but Iu2019m nervous itu2019s going to leak so I canu2019t carry it in my purse after all. Iu2019ve tried to rescrew the lid on and off but it still sits off kilter. Super bummed!!

Similar to another reviewer's experience, my bottle arrived nearly half empty and not at all like the one shown in pictures. Priced at $28 for 6ml vile that realistically contains 4ml of product, this is even more expensive per ml than the Le Labo product it is knocking off. What's worse is the product is currently out of stock and cannot be exchanged! Needless to say I am extremely disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New favorite after Commodity Book was discontinued.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this and when it came, the top was off and half the bottle was gone. That being said, if youu2019re into Le Labou2019s Santal 33, this is a good dupe for it. Itu2019s not as strong/punchy, but still gives you that fresh and energetic scent. In comparison to Commodityu2019s Book, this, to me, is not as dill-y and therefore more wearable.   Would recommend to pick this up in store instead, so you can avoid losing half your bottle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little more fresh than Le Labo but definitely very similar! For a fraction of the price, such a good option!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo good! I love warm/woody smells and this is perfect. It gets even better with wear. Reminds me of fig u2014 which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something that was neither sweet, fruity, or musky. I wanted to smell like the open minded, intelligent woman that I am. I spent hours at Sephora making myself dizzy trying to find a green smelling fragrance that was unique, fresh smelling, and lovely. this is it! on me it smells excellent. nothing like dill pickles like another commented. I'm too old for sweet and fruity (I'm 33), I want to smell... intelligent and respectable, and not too overpowering for the office. I finally found my scent! I've spent years searching.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Most beautiful scent, wished I had gotten the oil but next time. Doesnu2019t last as long as the oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so disappointed in this .I can't  even wear it as I smell like dill pickles! I have wore the same perfume since mid 1960's but like to try new ones ,this one didn't  work on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size to try out the scent, and I was pleasantly surprised! It starts off very spicy and on the masculine side, but it softens throughout the day into a totally different, but lovely scent. On me, I can still smell it after applying 8+ hours prior. Granted, it's definitely more subtle, but its noticeable enough for me to catch whiffs of now and again. Very satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have and love the perfume oil, so I was excited to try the spray. I'm disappointed. The scent is lovely (it's lighter, with more emphasis on sandalwood in the spray than in the oil, which is heavy on spice), but it only lasts about an hour. Not worth the money.
